title: A New Production Function Approach. (arXiv:2303.14428v1 [econ.TH])
abstract: This paper presents a new nested production function that is specifically designed for analyzing capital and labor intensity of manufacturing industries in developing and developed regions. The paper provides a rigorous theoretical foundation for this production function, as well as an empirical analysis of its performance in a sample of industries. The analysis shows that the production function can be used to accurately estimate the level of capital and labor intensity in industries, as well as to analyze the capacity utilization of these industries.
context:
Title: A New Production Function Approach. (arXiv:2303.14428v1 [econ.TH])
Abstract: This paper presents a new nested production function that is specifically designed for analyzing capital and labor intensity of manufacturing industries in developing and developed regions. The paper provides a rigorous theoretical foundation for this production function, as well as an empirical analysis of its performance in a sample of industries. The analysis shows that the production function can be used to accurately estimate the level of capital and labor intensity in industries, as well as to analyze the capacity utilization of these industries.
translated_title: 一种新的生产函数方法
translated_abstract: 本文提出了一种新的分层生产函数，旨在分析发展中国家和发达地区制造业的资本和劳动密集度。本文为该生产函数提供了严格的理论基础，并对其在一些行业样本中的表现进行了实证分析。分析结果表明，该生产函数能够准确估计行业的资本和劳动密集度，以及分析这些行业的产能利用率。
tldr: 本文提出了一种新的生产函数方法，旨在分析制造业的资本和劳动密集度。经实证分析表明，该方法可准确估计行业的资本和劳动密集度，以及分析这些行业的产能利用率。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a new production function approach aimed at analyzing the capital and labor intensity of manufacturing industries. Empirical analysis shows that this approach can accurately estimate the level of capital and labor intensity in industries and analyze the capacity utilization of these industries.
